name: Kivi, Toilet and Shotgun
description: Kivi, Toilet and Shotgun is a single player top down action game where your goal is to reach the end of the desert by avoiding all kinds of obstacles and fighting the desert raiders. Go up against foes in your vehicle and on foot. Take on powerful bosses, but make sure you're quipped for the fight!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256 Mb

reviews.review_text: From the First Time i started the game i was enjoying it  You can upgrade your car with: Armor, Better Wheels, Nitro Boost, Different weapons and mich more  But when you are not Driving you are able to walk around. You are also able to equip your character with a pistol, a shotgun, a grenade or even use a Katana. When you arrive at a village you must survive waves of enemies.  Another Great Thing: You must buy Fuel, repair you car and buy bullets. So you have to think what you buy .  I think the game is really worth buying
Nice game in Mad Max style. Cheap but satisfying, in deadly wasteland theme. For me it is even too hard to collect some fuel XD.
Don't let the low price lure you in. It's a trap!
